title: Kristen Lee (The/DRIVE, Business Insider, Jalopnik, R&T)
description:
Kristen Lee is one of our favorite people and favorite automotive journalists. She is the Deputy Editor at The/DRIVE.com. She has written for Business Insider, Jalopnik, Road & Track, and other publications. Follow her @kristenleeeeeeee
